column4: is this all i need                            "erlinux: 6- Create a Calendar: From the bottom-left side of the window, click Calendars to change Evolution to calendar view. Evolution creates a default 'personal' calendar for you that's empty, but we'll create a new one to share. Click File > New > Calendar.

erlinux: 8- Make it public: Now choose Edit > Preferences, click Calendar And Tasks, then choose the Calendar Publishing tab. By default, none of your calendars are published to the internet - you need to tell Evolution which ones you want to make public
Now I think you should go to google calendars and search through the options for a ical link
Carroarmato1 If you are following a guide step by step, you may move to a private channel so you don't flood this place. Thank you.
